review: We set it up with a projector and speaker for a cabin projecting against a wall.  Such fun for the children really enjoy having the ability to do movie night to wherever we can get wifi signal.  The content is excellent something for everyone makes prime a bargain

review: I avoid using fire TV & select from other services eg.netflix because what is included in my membership is not clearly & distinctly separated from the entertainment which I will be billed for.While I do enjoy the voice activated system,the time scanning for extra charges takes the fun out of it & can see myself shopping for a different system when my one year contract is nearing term.Thank You MICKEY
